title: GIVING BAYC: Yuga Labs Is Inspiring Kids To Ape Into Digital Art With Its Latest Donation To Miami's Big Brothers Big Sisters Program
description: Yuga Labs is giving BAYC to the city that inspired the company’s four founders to create the Bored Ape Yacht Club by donating a million dollars to the Magic City’s Big Brothers Big Sisters program to encourage kids to ape into digital art!“Building a more diverse web3 starts at home with Big Brothers Big Sisters of Miami,” Yuga Labs tweeted in a three-part thread on Thursday. “Miami, Florida is the birthplace of Yuga Labs and yesterday we completed our third installment of a $1M commitment to su
